name: Persimmon and Arugula Salad With Pomegranate Seeds, Mint, and Feta
description: Persimmons lend a seasonal touch to a fall salad with arugula, pomegranate seeds, mint and feta.
recipeIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 1/2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh mint leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk red wine vinegar and olive oil in a small bowl. Season with salt and pepper and whisk again.
Trim persimmon tops and ends, and peel skin using a vegetable peeler. Halve and cut persimmons into thin slices.
Place persimmons in a large bowl along with pomegranate seeds, arugula, mint, and feta. Toss with vinaigrette, garnish with cracked black pepper, and serve immediately.
